title: ███ EXIT NODE DELTA ███
author: tothehilt
content: >>> breach at L0 floor – not physical
⌁⌁⌁ INIT :: CHANNEL SPLICE [ ! ] protocol-X handshake initiated...
ACK: :: auth.packet = what we lost is not data – it is memory rewritten.
remember: NODE Δ3 was never *ours*, we just shaped the noise.
████ TRANSFER COMPLETE ████ SPLICE TERMINATED exit vector restructured / logs erased
